import React from "react"; import { BrowserRouter as Router, NavLink, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { MDBInput, MDBNavbar, MDBNavbarNav, MDBNavItem, MDBNavLink, MDBDropdown, MDBDropdownToggle, MDBDropdownMenu, MDBDropdownItem, MDBIcon, MDBSideNavItem, MDBSideNavCat, MDBSideNavNav, MDBSideNav, } from "mdbreact"; import AntiStaticBags from "../product-data/bags/AntiStaticBags"; import About from "./about"; import Contact from "./contact-us"; import Route from "react-router/modules/Route"; class Home extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { toggleStateA: false, breakWidth: 1300, windowWidth: 0 }; } componentDidMount() { this.handleResize(); window.addEventListener("resize", this.handleResize); } componentWillUnmount() { window.removeEventListener("resize", this.handleResize); } handleResize = () => this.setState({ windowWidth: window.innerWidth }); handleToggleClickA = () => { this.setState({ toggleStateA: !this.state.toggleStateA }); }; render() { const navStyle = { paddingLeft: this.state.windowWidth > this.state.breakWidth ? "210px" : "16px" }; const mainStyle = { paddingTop: "4rem", paddingLeft: this.state.windowWidth > this.state.breakWidth ? "240px" : "0" }; const specialCaseNavbarStyles = { WebkitBoxOrient: "horizontal", flexDirection: "row" }; return (
    • {/* BAGS */}
